body: There is a saying that rapist should get one fingers chopped off without pain killer. Satanic beings who cucks people around should get a better treatment. Firstly tie up them in a chair, and pluck off all their nails. Second should be a lot gentle which slicing up their skin from bottom to top. Make sure bleeding is too much or else they will faint and that is not much fun. For the third, try roughing up a bit such as cutting off the ear and stabbing up the hands and legs. Forth is almost done which is cutting the liver and gouging the eyeballs out. Lastly is the heavenly pleasure which you end it by spurring acid slowly to the half bottom and burned the upper half by pouring oils. Aaaaand the soul will finally rest in peace in hell to meets their father satan.
